extendedInfo.description: Rebuilt from the ground up to be lightweight and efficient. We suspect 2x speed boost and consistency compared to Mini Info classic.IMPORTANT 1: "Classic Pro Key" app not compatible with Mini Info+IMPORTANT 2: Legacy Pro User, please contact us with your previous transaction details at support@dynotes.com For all valid transactions, we will grant one pro code as a gift.IMPORTANT 3: If you didn't get the pro features after purchase via Google in-app-billing, please contact us at support@dynotes.com. We DO respond to your emails.Overview: - 2x1 Widget - 8 Info Pieces - Toggle Bar - Notification Info Bar - Tons of CustomizationWidget Features: - Preview pane (see the widget before you add it) - Intuitive info piece selection - 2 Widget Layouts - Default: One tidy row of info - Solo Detailed: Mimic the main app on your homescreen - Select the number of info pieces - 10 Backgrounds - Individually select info pieces on a per widget basis - Text Color - Progress bar color - Updates on system battery change to avoid polling - Icon theming coming soonNotification: - Optional Feature - Battery % in badge form - Color style selection - Drag and drop info piece reorder - Check shown and hidden info pieces - Updates on battery status change (simultaneously as widget) - Tap to open Mini InfoInfo Features:Battery: - Percentage, Temperature (F and C), Voltage, StatusDisk Info: - Available, Total and Used - Internal Disk Space, External SD Card, Internal SD Card - App, Cache, System data - Set custom disk locationsCPU & RAM: - Used CPU, Available CPU - CPU Speed - Available, Total and Used RAMNetwork: - Measure Mobile Received, Transmitted (in/out) - Total Received, Transmitted, Bandwidth - Budget to track percentage of network used per monthVolume: - Ringer modes: Silent, Vibrate, Sound, Silent + Vibrate - Master volume, ringer, notification, media, alarm, voice call, system volumesToggles: - Wifi, Bluetooth, GPS, Screen Brightness, Airplane Mode, APN (3G/EDGE), Auto Rotation, Auto Sync, Screen Timeout, Unlock Pattern, Mini Info Menu - Long press for settings page of each setting - Toast Notifications for Wifi and Bluetooth connection - Drag and drop Reorder and show/hide togglesCustomizations: - Custom tap actions - Progress bar available/used - Progress bar colors - Each info piece, available/used - Auto kill feature, click to closeBonus Features: - High resolution icons - All in one display - Landscape and Portrait orientations - Device Info shortcut - About + Help Documentation - Fast friendly supportSupports Android versions 2.0+, including Jelly Bean, Ice cream sandwich, Gingerbread, Froyo, etc.The Mini Info Teamwww.dynotes.comFollow us on Twitter! twitter.com/dynotes

reviews.title: Very simple and nice!
reviews.comment: With me, it\'s very nice, good app, smart, thin and easy to use. No bug. Thank to dev.
reviews.author: \304\220\341\272\241i Nguy\341\273\205n

reviews.title: Bought Pro after years of use
reviews.comment: ... despite not really needing added features. But after changing toolbar order, the app now crashes each time I click the widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on galaxy s3 or s4
reviews.comment: The widget doesn\'t show accurate memory on device or SD card.
reviews.author: Derek Craig

reviews.title: Simple but accurate
reviews.comment: Simple yet accurate app. Good for quick system checks and app launches
reviews.author: Tim Wetter

reviews.title: RIP OFF - BEWARE
reviews.comment: This is a rip off. In the unlock key for the Classic version, you can uninstall/reinstall without having to pay again. With plus version, they give you 3 extra unlock keys, but if you forget to email them, or reset phone and have lost email, you have to buy another unlock code. BEWARE This vendor no longer uses Google Play for Pro Key so they can steal your money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.comment: Great little app with bad purchase system. Will not allow you to reinstall. Shame really.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great support repurchase will suck later..
reviews.comment: I inquired about the free pro unlock and was helped very quickly and efficiently. Great support team. I would have given five stars but for the fact that the next phone I get will have to have the app bought again. Booh! ! !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Decent App... Try making another one guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money
reviews.comment: Looks good but if you reset phone, change roms or even clear cache your money is gone. No support for previous customers, so one day purchasers of this version will be dropped as well. Don\'t say you weren\'t warned!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No permanent key?
reviews.comment: I had a problem, there\'s a bug in toggle screen, which loops all toggle icons, after i close it, give me force close, and resetting the phone wont fix it, i had to clear the data, to fix it and now it askedme to register again so i had to give one pro key!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pro Upgrade no longer works
reviews.comment: I was skeptical about purchasing the Pro Upgrade license via an in-app purchase, as I prefer to do purchases via the Play market. Sure enough, after a new ROM upgrade my \"Pro\" purchase is no longer showing up, even after a Titanium Backup restore.  Turned out to be a waste of money since I can\'t even use the part I purchased.  Disappointing. Please make the Pro key an app we can purchase in the Market, no in app transactions that don\'t stick with it when changing ROMs.
reviews.author: Zane Ross

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: It\'s buggy! It won\'t let me add a widget with internal in it. Also can\'t see battery stats. Support also sucks. I\'d give lower score if I could.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks again
reviews.comment: I had payed for the in game app upgrade and there had been some confusion between me and Google I guess so I didn\'t receive it. I so I sent a email to the development team with in 20 min got a reply and a solution all under 30 all together so 5/5 costumer service the widget works great and I love it if mean I payed for the upgrade
reviews.author: Rudy Hernandez

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Aram Ayvazyan

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Cheats legacy users out of their money. Uninstall promptly!
reviews.author: Lance Mansfield

reviews.title: Older version was better.
reviews.comment: The pro upgrade process is not working for me. Purchased and auto upgrade process did not work. Nor did I get the extra keys promised. I\'m sure eventually the developer will respond.   I like to install custom ROMs and do clean installs of my beloved APS from the play store. The older version did this flawlessly. Don\'t think this one will so I\'m giving it 2 stars for the flawed registration process.
reviews.author: Dj Christie

reviews.title: Mini info + system widget
reviews.comment: Great app help to boost the volume .
reviews.author: Celina Roberts

reviews.title: Awesome widget !
reviews.comment: This is a nice improvement over the Classic version which I have always used and loved since the beginning of Android.  Put this on your home screen next to the open signal widget and use a launcher that you can turn your home screen in to five rows that way you can have your Clock, Google search bar, these widgets and four folders.  Great Job !
reviews.author: Brett Johnson

reviews.title: **Root users**
reviews.comment: 2 words: Titanium Backup. Tried, tested and working! Restores app with pro key working as it should. I have emailed dev explaining I paid for legacy app and expected new app key for free, which I got, but would lose if I ROMd. Titanium ftw <3 root 2 star deduction for this injustice, otherwise a 5*app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Has same fault as classic. Can\'t find external sdcard. Sees internal memory as extsdcard in Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: A Google User
